page.title: 15FARMING
page.content: { 365 hectares}are farmed in our area with{four farms.}Park Farm is the biggest with 140 hectares. Two farms have{dairy herds}with a total of 250{Friesian}cows.{Milk yield is nearly 15 litres per cow per day. The milk is collected daily and taken to the Unigate Dairy in Newport. All four farms have{beef herds}of{Hereford crossed with other breeds. There are 230 beef cattle. When old enough they are sent to Salisbury or Chichester markets. Westridge Farm keeps 34 {Landrace and Large White pigs}and 12 {Suffolk sheep. {Arable crops}include: {wheat}40 hectares,{Barley}51h,{Oats}6h and{Kale}10h. Most of the remaining farm land is{pasture and hayfields, Farmers have consideration for wildlife and the farmland has many copses and hedgrows.
